channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP User Frontend – Membership, Profile, Registration & Post Submission Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP User Frontend – Membership, Profile, Registration & Post Submission Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-25076|2024-08-03T19:56:09.883Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20frontend%20%E2%80%93%20membership%2C%20profile%2C%20registration%20%26%20post%20submission%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The WP User Frontend WordPress plugin before 3.5.26 does not validate and escape the status parameter before using it in a SQL statement in the Subscribers dashboard, leading to an SQL injection. Due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping, this could also lead to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
